title: Rank Trim Not Showing Up in Loading Screen?
body: Hello, I've recently achieved the rank of Silver 3 (not the best but I'm happy), however my Silver Trim will not show during the loading screen. I do not understand why, other than perhaps it's because I achieved Silver during pre-season? Is this the case?

replies.body:
Hello!

Ranked borders update each season, and show the previous seasons ending rank.  Because you were not ranked in the 2014 Season you don't have a border.

Hope this clears up any confusion!
So then if u get ranked in preseason 6 you will get the trim in season 7?

The preseason ranking doesn't count toward the season - it's more to prepare you for the changes.

You can raise your MMR in the preseason and that will help you potentially get ranked higher when the season starts, but because of the soft reset at the start of each season the ranking doesn't carry over.
It's now preseason 6  and riot has still not given me my silver trim around the loading screen and I was ranked before the preseason as well, does anyone know why I haven't gotten it yet
will you get the border after the pre-season?

> [{quoted}](name=ItsGflow,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eqXRBoEH,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-26T07:09:46.618+0000)
>
> perhaps it's because I achieved Silver during pre-season? Is this the case?

Yep. Pre-season doesn't give you borders. Borders are given before Pre-Season. It's basically Pre-Season 5. So Season 4 has been over for awhile now. Even someone who has a Gold border at end of Season 4 can't get Platinum border during Pre-Season 5. Cause it's already done with.
